name: Palak Chole (Garbanzo beans/Chana And Spinach Curry)
description: A delicious and healthy garbanzo beans/chana and spinach curry (Palak Chole). Full of flavor and great for weeknights. Vegan Gluten Free Recipe.

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook drained garbanzo beans with 2 cups of water for 2-3 whistles or until soft enough so they get mashed really easily.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook drained garbanzo beans with 2 cups of water for 2-3 whistles or until soft enough so they get mashed really easily.

recipeInstructions.text: Take all the non powdered spices(bay leaf, cinnamon, cardamom, cloves) and crush them a bit using a mortar and pestle or pulse in grinder/blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Take all the non powdered spices(bay leaf, cinnamon, cardamom, cloves) and crush them a bit using a mortar and pestle or pulse in grinder/blender.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat the oil on medium heat. Add all the spices and roast them for 3-4 minutes until they start to give out an aroma.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat the oil on medium heat. Add all the spices and roast them for 3-4 minutes until they start to give out an aroma.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped onions and cook on medium heat until the onions are golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped onions and cook on medium heat until the onions are golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the tomatoes and mix well .
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the tomatoes and mix well .

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the spinach and cooked garbanzo beans and salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the spinach and cooked garbanzo beans and salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on medium low heat covered for 15-20 minutes with occasional stirring.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on medium low heat covered for 15-20 minutes with occasional stirring.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with fresh chopped cilantro leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with fresh chopped cilantro leaves.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot and garnish with finely chopped onions and lemon juice and serve with Roti or Naan or buttered bread!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot and garnish with finely chopped onions and lemon juice and serve with Roti or Naan or buttered bread!

keywords: healthy curry, pressure cooker recipe, spinach curry
